description:
Fast and dynamic kart races, if you are craving it and looking for it, Kart Crazy Race Simulator will not make you bored. Choose the map that suits you, set the game difficulty that is convenient for you and earn money to buy new karts that differ not only in design but also in power .

Features:
Variety of karts
Variety of maps
Different difficulty levels of opponents
Convenient and dynamic control
Various customization of races
Kart shop
Realistic graphics and sounds
Defeat all opponents, improve your kart driving skills and beat your records by buying powerful karts.
name: Kart Crazy Race Simulator Game
